borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions:
<div><p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: left; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-fareast-language:EN-GB">The
two-storey rear extension would extend beyond a 45 degree angle with the corner
of neighbouring properties and it would result in an increased overbearing
impact and a harmful loss of outlook,&nbsp;daylight, and sunlight to the
occupiers of no. 56 Gainsborough Road, therefore constituting unneighbourly
development and contrary to:</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-fareast-language:
EN-GB"><o:p></o:p></span></p></div><div><br></div><div><p><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">-
National Planning Policy Framework </span>National Planning Policy Framework
(NPPF) (DLUHC, 2021)<o:p></o:p></p><p><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">- Policy
D6 of the London Plan (March 2021);</span><o:p></o:p></p><p><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">- Policy
CP3 of </span>Local Development Framework (LDF) Core Strategy (July 2010)<o:p></o:p></p><p><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">-
Policies BP8 and BP11 of the </span>Local Development Framework (LDF) Borough
Wide Development Plan Document (DPD) (March 2011)<o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">- The Residential
Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012);<o:p></o:p></span></p><p class="MsoNormal">









</p><p><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">-
Policies SP2, DMD1 and DMD6 of </span>The London Borough of Barking and
Dagenham’s Draft Local Plan: (Regulation 19 Submission Version, December 2021)<o:p></o:p></p></div>

<div><p class="MsoNormal" style="mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
text-align:justify;line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-fareast-language:EN-GB">The
proposed two-storey side and rear extension, by reason of its excessive mass,
scale and design would appear as a unsuitable</span><span style="font-family:
&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-fareast-language:
EN-GB">&nbsp;addition to the main dwelling and it would&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;
mso-fareast-language:EN-GB">result&nbsp;in the closure of an important gap between
2 properties which is&nbsp;considered harmful to the appearance of the house,
built form of the terrace and character of the area, notably given the location
of the application site within the Becontree Estate. As such, the proposed
development is contrary to:</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-fareast-language:
EN-GB"><o:p></o:p></span></p></div><div><br></div><div><p><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">-
National Planning Policy Framework </span>National Planning Policy Framework
(NPPF) (DLUHC, July 2021)<o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">- Policy D4 of the
London Plan (March 2021)<o:p></o:p></span></p><p><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">-
Policies CP2 and CP3 of the </span>Local Development Framework (LDF) Core
Strategy (July 2010)<o:p></o:p></p><p><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">-
Policies BP2, BP8 and BP11 of the </span>Local Development Framework (LDF)
Borough Wide Development Plan Document (DPD) (March 2011)<o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">- The Residential
Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012)<o:p></o:p></span></p><p class="MsoNormal">









</p><p><b><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">- </span></b><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">Policies SP2, DMD1, DMD4 and DMD6 of </span>The London Borough of
Barking and Dagenham’s Draft Local Plan: (Regulation 19 Submission Version,
December 2021)<o:p></o:p></p></div>
description: Construction of a two storey side and two storey rear extension. Construction of a single storey outbuilding for office, playroom gym and shower/toilet.
